sentence.Network_en: Eating in East Berlin used to be a hazardous and joyless experience.
sentence.Network_cn: 在东柏林就餐曾经是一件危险而且沉闷无趣的事情。

sentence.Network_en: Saunas can be hazardous if misused. Avoid a big meal beforehand.
sentence.Network_cn: 洗桑拿浴如果方法不当会有危险，浴前切忌饱食。

sentence.Network_en: German law forbids the dumping of hazardous waste on German soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 德国法律禁止在德国本土倾倒有害废料。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French hasardeux, from hasard 'chance' (see hazard)

entry.tran: （尤指对健康或安全）有危险的，有危害的
entry.def: Something that is hazardous is dangerous, especially to people's health or safety.

example.ex: They have no way to dispose of the hazardous waste they produce...
example.tran: 他们没有办法处理掉自己产生的有害废料。

example.ex: Passive smoking can be hazardous to health.

sentences.sentence: "extremely risky going out in the tide and fog"

auth_sentence.content: Bankruptcies are most frequent in the most hazardous trades.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bankruptcies are most frequent in the most hazardous trades.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bankruptcies are most frequent in the most hazardous trades.

auth_sentence.content: Such an enterprise would be in the highest degree arduous and hazardous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such an enterprise would be in the highest degree arduous and hazardous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such an enterprise would be in the highest degree arduous and hazardous.

auth_sentence.content: Clawson said he didn't know what could have been detected but none of the monitors showed hazardous emissions.

Sentence.sentence: Researchers studying teenagers in Israel concluded that, in that hazardous environment, mobile phones were regarded as "security objects" in parent-teen relationships―important because they provided the possibility ofcontact and communication at all times.

sentences.cn: 含有有害废物的垃圾场

sentences.en: Surface water made driving conditions hazardous.
sentences.cn: 路面积水对行车安全构成隐患。

sentences.en: These conditions are very hazardous for shipping.
sentences.cn: 这些情况对航海非常不利。
